page.title: 12A Day in Anthea's Life.
page.content: My name is Anthea Moffat.It is Tuesday morning and I've just woken up.Like most mornings,I am wakened by my mother at 7a.m.I am usually a good riser.After a thorough wash,I get dressed into my school clothes and have a quick light breakfast of toast.I get my bag ready and head off to Mountfleurie Primary. I am in Mr.Gordon's Primary 6 class and today we start with craft(macrame or sewing)then spelling,language and S.R.A.Reading Lab.In the afternoon, we get gym,followed by maths. Occasionally,I do weaving with a parent who comes in to help. When I go home from school,I prepare for my dancing class _ I do Highland, Tap and Ballet.I then have to go to the Guides , after which I go home and go to bed exhausted!
